name: Leuhaus
description:
The small summer house LEUHAUS is situtated quiet  in the district Burgstall. Local centre oft Mayrhofen and valley station of the Penkenbahn are 1 km away. To the Horbergbahn it is 1 km. Ski bus stop 150 m. 
Bread roll service. Parking bay.Partial wooden floor and carpeted floor. Sat TV. balcony. 
With reservation we ask for a deposit.

makesOffer.name: Holiday home, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
